description: This warning sign tells you that you may not drive there if your vehicle is

answers.description: higher than 4.42m
longer than 4.42m
wider than 4.42m

description: This road sign shows that:

answers.description: You must drive there at all times if your vehicle has a GVM of 12 tons.
You must drive there at all times if your vehicle has a GVM of 8 tons.
If you want to you can drive there if your vehicle has a GVM of 10 tons.

correctAnswers.description: You must drive there at all times if your vehicle has a GVM of 12 tons.

description:
You may carry passengers in a vehicle that is being towed: 
1. If you only travel at 35 km/h
2. If the vehicle that is being towed is a semi-trailerOnly 
3. if the vehicle that tows something is a tractor

answers.description: (1) and (2) are correct
All of the above are correct
(2) is the only correct answer

description: What does warning sign L10 show you?

answers.description: Roads crossing ahead and other vehicles from the side must stop or yield at the intersection
A 4-way stop will be found ahead where the roads cross
A railway line intersects with the road that you are travelling on

correctAnswers.description: Roads crossing ahead and other vehicles from the side must stop or yield at the intersection

description: What does this blue sign show you?

answers.description: You may not drive slower than 50km/h
That sign is applicable for 50 m
You may not drive faster than 50 km/h

answers.description: You will find a one-way road ahead

You must only drive straight on

description: What does sign stop sign tell you?

answers.description: It is the same as a yield sign and you can proceed without stopping
Makes sure that it is safe, wait until all traffic has departed and then drive on
Stop and drive when it is safe to do so in the sequence that vehicles stopped at the stop line

description:
You may not obtain a learners license if 

 (i) you already have a license that authorizes the driving of the same vehicle class 
 (ii) you are declared unfit to obtain a driving license for a certain period and period still prevails 
 (iii) you license was suspended temporarily and the suspension has not yet expired 

 SELECT THE CORRECT COMBINATION

answers.description: (i) only is correct
(ii) and (iii) only are correct
(i), (ii) and (iii) are correct

description: The only instance where you may stop on a freeway is...

answers.description: To obey a road traffic sign
For a rest during a tiring journey
To pick up a hitchhiker

correctAnswers.description: To obey a road traffic sign

description: You are not allowed to stop…

answers.description: Where you are also not allowed to park

description: What is important with regard to the hooter of your vehicle?

answers.description: The tone of pitch of the sound may not change
Someone must hear it from a distance of at least 45 m
You may use it to get the attention of someone that you would like to offer a lift

description:

 (i) Must immediately stop your vehicle
 (ii) Must determine the damage to the vehicle
 (iii) May refuse to give your name and address to anybody except to the police 

 SELECT THE CORRECT COMBINATION

answers.description: (i) and (ii) only are correct
(ii) only is correct
All of the above are correct

description:
The distance that is required for a driver of a motor vehicle to stop is:

 (i) Longer on a wet road than on a dry road.
 (ii) Longer if the vehicle is traveling at a higher speed.
 (iii) Longer if the vehicle is loaded. 

 SELECT THE CORRECT COMBINATION

answers.description: None of the above is correct.
only (i) is correct.
All of the above are correct

correctAnswers.description: All of the above are correct

description: The maximum distance between two vehicles being towed is:

Which is allowed when towing another vehicle ? 

1. A motor car tows another motorcar with a rope and drives 40km/h
2. You tow another vehicle with a tow bar 
3. A tractor tows a trailer with 10 passengers on it at a speed of 30 km/h

answers.description: (2) and (3) are only correct
(2) is only correct
All of the above

description:
What is true with regard to seat belts? 

1. If your vehicle has seat belts in the rear , it must be worn
2. You need not wear a seat belt when reversing 
3. Children younger than 14 years need not wear a seat belt
4. If the front seat has a seat belt , your only passenger may not sit at the back where there is no seat belt

answers.description: (1) is only correct
(1), (2) and (4) are correct
All of the above are correct

description:

2. You are not allowed to drive on a freeway 
3. No passengers are allowed with you in the vehicle

answers.description: All of the above are correct

Only (1) and (2) are correct
